translation: Agriculture, cattle-rearing, and trade are the duties of the Vaisya (merchant), born of their own nature; and service is the duty of the Sudra (servant-class), born of their own nature.
commentary: 18.44 Agriculture Cattle Protection Commerce agriculture? cattlerearing and trade? Vaishyakarma the duties of Vaisya? Svabhavajam born of nature? paricharyatmakam consisting of service? Karma action? of the Sudra? Even also? Svabhavajam born of nature.Commentary When a man performs his duties rightly according to his caste and order of life his heart is purified and he goes to heaven. Do you declare Apastambha Dharma Sutra?
